name: Interface RelationType
text:
The RelationType interface has to be implemented by any class expected to
 represent a relation type.

methods.description: Returns the list of role definitions (ArrayList of RoleInfo objects).

methods.method_sig:
RoleInfo getRoleInfo (String roleInfoName)
              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                     RoleInfoNotFoundException
methods.description:
Returns the role info (RoleInfo object) for the given role info name
 (null if not found).
